details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-1:2005 - 6.4 Transparency - Blend mode
details.description: The following keys, if present in an ExtGState object, shall have the values shown: BM - Normal or Compatible

rule.description: The following keys, if present in an ExtGState object, shall have the values shown: BM - Normal or Compatible

error.message: An ExtGState dictionary contains the BM key (blend mode) with value %1 that is neither Normal or Compatible
